faqItems.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqItems.answer: We accept major credit cards, including Visa, Mastercard, and American Express. We also support payment through PayPal.

faqItems.question: How can I track my order?
faqItems.answer: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a confirmation email with a tracking number. You can use this tracking number to track your package on our website.

faqItems.question: What is your return policy?
faqItems.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all products. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return the item for a full refund or exchange. Please refer to our Returns page for more information.

faqItems.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we offer international shipping to select countries. During the checkout process, you can enter your address to see if we ship to your location and to calculate the shipping costs.

faqItems.question: Can I cancel or change my order?
faqItems.answer: If you need to cancel or make changes to your order, please contact our customer support as soon as possible. We will do our best to accommodate your request, but please note that orders that have already been shipped cannot be modified.

faqItems.question: How can I contact your customer support?
faqItems.answer: You can reach our customer support team by phone at XXX-XXXX-XXXX or by email at support@toddington.com. Our support hours are Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm EST.
